   contain the root `toctree` directive.

MachineTeacher
==========================================

MachineTeacher is a package the make interactions between teachers and learners over a dataset.


Requirements
==================

The requirements are listed on the requirements.txt file, in machine_teacer/requirements.txt

To quick install all the requirements, run the following command on a terminal:


	$ pip3 install -r requirements.txt

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   usage.rst
